means: （因省钱、省时或省力等而）收效大的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均有"有效的"之意。
means: effective ： 侧重产生实际的效果、效力或具有取得预期效果的能力，指人指物都适用。
efficient ： 侧重指积极有效，效率高，效果好，节省精力。指人时，强调其能干、熟练的技巧。

sentence.Network_en: The pill is the most efficient method of birth control.
sentence.Network_cn: 服用避孕药是最有效的避孕方法。

sentence.Network_en: These people are very efficient, very organized and excellent time managers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些人做事效率很高，井井有条，并且十分善于管理时间。

sentence.Network_en: The process of replication is very quick and efficient.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... well--educated 受过良好教育的 efficient 有效率的； energetic 精力充沛的.
程序应该是高效 （efficient） 的， 只使用必需的时间和内存。 程序应该是通用（general- purpose） 的， 使得下次构建类似的程序时 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... （efficacy.y 变成I，再加 ) efficient a （做事）有效的 （false 错，假+.
efficacious 有效的efficient 有效,有能力effort 努力

list.abs: 日本品质 LED隧道灯80W ... 功率因数 Power Factor 电源效率 Power Efficiency 输出模式 Output mode.
核能专业术语(7) ... conversion coefficient 转换系数 conversion efficiency 转换效率 conversion electron 变换电子.
中经社词汇索引_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... theme park 主题乐园 thermal efficiency 热效率 thermal insulation 隔热.
光通量 - 维基百科，自由的百科全书 ... 光视效能（ Luminous efficacy） 发光效率（ luminous efficiency） 流明（ lm= cd·sr）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'making, causing', usually in efficient cause): from Latin efficient- 'accomplishing', from the verb efficere (see effect). The current sense dates from the late 18th cent

entry.def: If something or someone is efficient, they are able to do tasks successfully, without wasting time or energy.

example.ex: With today's more efficient contraception women can plan their families and careers.
example.tran: 如今有了更加有效的避孕方法，女性便可以规划她们的家庭和事业。

means.word_mean: 1. being effective without wasting time or effort or expense;
2. able to accomplish a purpose; functioning effectively;

sentences.sentence: "people who will do nothing unless they get something out of it for themselves are often highly effective persons..."-G.B.Shaw

auth_sentence.content: That was the difference, Wales were more efficient.
auth_sentence.res_content: That was the difference, Wales were more efficient.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That was the difference, Wales were more efficient.

auth_sentence.content: He recently invested in a fuel-efficient, diesel Volkswagen.
auth_sentence.res_content: He recently invested in a fuel-efficient, diesel Volkswagen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He recently invested in a fuel-efficient, diesel Volkswagen.

auth_sentence.content: To be sure, not all ETFs are tax-efficient.
auth_sentence.res_content: To be sure, not all ETFs are tax-efficient.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To be sure, not all ETFs are tax-efficient.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 缺乏的, 不足的, 不完善的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+fici做,制作+ent……的→做得不够的→不足的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效的,效率高的;有能力的,能胜任的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ef出+fici做,制作+ent……的→能做出事来→有效的
pro前面+fici做+ent……的→做在[别人] 前面→精通
proficient[[adj.精通的;熟练的]]→n.[in]熟练,精通

Sentence.sentence: Most American college students need to be efficient readers.
Necessity will force the swift adoption of more efficient ones.
Supporters of home education claim that it is less expensive and far more efficient than mass public education.

means.word_mean: 有能力的, 效率高的

jushi.chinese: 她是一个有能力的经理。

jushi.english: She was very efficient in reducing waste.
jushi.chinese: 她在减少浪费方面很有办法。
